Service Details: Offers summer camping for children, youth, and adults, including:- Counsellor/Leader in Training Camp (ages 14-17)- Intermediate Camp (ages 10-13)- Junior Camp (ages 7-10)- Junior-Intermediate Camp (ages 7-13 years)- Try Camp (ages 6-11), and Teen Camp (ages 13-16) Camp grounds also available for private rentals.
How to Apply: Please see our website for application
